query:
-- Criar admin user (senha: senha123)
INSERT INTO admin_users (campaignId, username, password, name, isOwner, active, createdAt)
SELECT id, 'guilherme.ramos@constrixengenharia.com.br', '$2a$10$N9qo8uLOickgx2ZMRZoMyeIjZAgcfl7p92ldGxad68LJZdL17lhWy', 'Guilherme Ramos', 1, 1, NOW()
FROM campaigns WHERE slug = 'teste-guilherme';

-- Verificar criação
SELECT 
  c.id as campaign_id,
  c.slug,
  au.id as admin_id,
  au.username,
  au.name
FROM campaigns c
JOIN admin_users au ON au.campaignId = c.id
WHERE c.slug = 'teste-guilherme';
